roleset.name: to saturate in alcohol, or convert to alcohol

role.descr: Resulting state after conversion, attribute of arg1

example.name: Science jargon
example.text: Polyvinyl acetate was alcoholized to such an extent that 88% of the acetate groups were removed.
example.arg: to such an extent that 88% of the acetate groups were removed.

roleset.note: ALCOHOLIZE-V NOTES: Roleset added in parallel expansion of VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire (from alcoholize.01-v)
